schools.name: Kyoto University
schools.description: Kyoto University is Japan's second-oldest university and one of its most prestigious, known for producing Nobel Prize winners.
schools.motto: Liberty and Independence

schools.name: Tsinghua University
schools.address: No. 30 Shuangqing Road, Haidian District, Beijing 100084
schools.description: Tsinghua University is one of China's most prestigious universities, often called the 'MIT of China'. Founded in 1911.
schools.motto: Self-Discipline and Social Responsibility

schools.name: Fudan University
schools.address: No. 220 Handan Road, Yangpu District, Shanghai 200433
schools.description: Fudan University is a prestigious national university in Shanghai, known for journalism, medicine, and liberal arts.
schools.motto: Rich in Knowledge and Tenacious of Purpose

schools.name: Nanyang Technological University
schools.description: NTU is Singapore's second-largest university, known for engineering and technology programs. Founded in 1981.
schools.motto: Inspiring Innovation, Transforming Lives

schools.name: KAIST
schools.description: KAIST is Korea's leading science and technology university, known for research excellence.
schools.motto: Vision 2030: Leading Science and Technology for Humanity

schools.name: Shanghai Jiao Tong University
schools.address: No. 800 Dongchuan Road, Minhang District, Shanghai 200240
schools.description: SJTU is one of China's oldest and most prestigious universities, known for engineering and medicine.
schools.motto: Seek Knowledge, Practice Truth, Build a Better Future

schools.name: Chinese University of Hong Kong
schools.description: CUHK is a public research university in Hong Kong, known for its bilingual education and research.
schools.motto: Through Learning and Wisdom to Virtue

schools.name: Korea University
schools.description: Korea University is one of South Korea's oldest and most prestigious private universities.
schools.motto: Liberty, Truth, and Independence

schools.name: Waseda University
schools.description: Waseda University is one of Japan's most prestigious private universities, founded by politician Shigenobu Okuma.
schools.motto: Independence of Academic Freedom

schools.name: National Chengchi University
schools.address: No. 64, Sec. 2, ZhiNan Rd., Wenshan District, Taipei 116
schools.description: NCCU is Taiwan's premier university for social sciences, law, and diplomacy.
schools.motto: Sincerity and Farsightedness

schools.name: University of Malaya
schools.description: UM is Malaysia's oldest university and consistently ranked as the top university in Malaysia.
schools.motto: Ilmu Punca Kemajuan (Knowledge is the Root of Progress)

schools.name: Chulalongkorn University
schools.description: Chulalongkorn University is Thailand's oldest and most prestigious university, known as 'Chula'.
schools.motto: For the Benefit of Thai Education

schools.name: Yale-NUS College
schools.name_cn: 耶鲁-新加坡国立大学学院
schools.description: Yale-NUS College is Singapore's first liberal arts college, a collaboration between Yale and NUS.
schools.motto: Taking Learning to the Frontiers

schools.name: Hong Kong Polytechnic University
schools.description: PolyU is a public research university in Hong Kong, known for business, engineering, and design.
schools.motto: To learn and to apply, for the benefit of mankind

schools.name: Tokyo Institute of Technology
schools.description: Tokyo Tech is Japan's leading university for science and technology education and research.
schools.motto: Research and Education in Science and Technology for Peace and Prosperity

schools.name: Sun Yat-sen University
schools.description: Sun Yat-sen University is a comprehensive national university in Guangdong, named after Dr. Sun Yat-sen.
schools.motto: Study Extensively, Inquire Accurately, Discriminate Clearly, and Practise Earnestly

schools.name: National Cheng Kung University
schools.description: NCKU is Taiwan's leading university for engineering, named after General Koxinga (Koxinga).
schools.motto: Honesty, Integrity, Sincerity, and Trustworthiness

schools.name: Sungkyunkwan University
schools.description: SKKU is one of Korea's oldest universities, originally founded in 1398 during the Joseon Dynasty.
schools.motto: I will bring myself to the highest level of perfection

schools.name: Keio University
schools.description: Keio University is Japan's oldest modern higher education institution, founded by Fukuzawa Yukichi.
schools.motto: Freedom and Independence

schools.name: Nagasaki University
schools.description: Nagasaki University is a public university in Nagasaki, known for its peace studies and tropical medicine.
schools.motto: Open Doors, Open Minds

schools.name: Hokkaido University
schools.description: Hokkaido University is a national university in Sapporo, known for agricultural and environmental sciences.
